rationales.self_direction: Reorganizes office for whiteboard despite cloud expectations, embraces being 'old-fashioned', plans to ignore alignment initiatives. Strong self-direction and anti-conformity. Values stability of proven methods (security) and traditional approaches.

rationales.self_direction: Actively challenges top-down decisions with data, teaches younger workers about experience over training, collaborates with Sergio to resist standardization. Strong self-direction, uses data to demonstrate competence (achievement), mentors others (benevolence).

rationales.self_direction: Core frustration is 'nobody asked us before deciding' - autonomy violated. Still finding workarounds and overriding the system (self-direction). Helps younger staff navigate issues (benevolence). His expertise and authority not respected (power -1).
